I've fixed up a decent map to do as our world map for the moment. 
It's posted under the Files section of the NBWRPG yahoogroup (you 
can access it by clicking on the Files link on the left side of the 
browser window).

I'll put bases on it soon, and any factions other than the Maximals 
and the Predacons will have to copy the map, and put a dot onto the 
map where they want it to be, and then email it too me.

The map file name is called "Circe.jpg".
